attributes.action: Audit of all service charities including the word HEROES in their title.
attributes.additional_details:
Dr Alex May
Rob Cave BBC Salford
Accounts details on the Charity Commission website.
attributes.background:
Help For Heroes (H4H) are the primary charity which benefit injured or dead servicemen.
Numerous others have sprung up with the word HEROES in them. Do they equal or surpass the work of H4H ?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament is not responsible for auditing charity names.

If you would like to make a complaint that a charity is not doing what it claims to do, you can report your concerns to the Charity Commission using this form:

http://forms.charitycommission.gov.uk/contact-us/general-enquiries/report-a-concern-about-a-charity/raising-concerns-about-a-charity/
